products.name: Classic Kitty
products.description: The classic outfit from Hello Kitty that we all know and love!

products.name: Smarty Kitty
products.description: Any experiments and tests will come out positive for Hello Kitty looking cute in a lab coat.

products.name: Spooky Kitty
products.description: A kitty so cute that you will want to cuddle her to death, and after!

products.name: Sharky Kitty
products.description: She's adorable but she's not afraid to bite if she needs to!

products.name: Strawberry Kitty
products.description: So yummy and sweet that you'll just want to eat her up!

products.name: Stripey Kitty
products.description: These stripped PJ's call for a nice, cozy cat nap accompanied by some sweet dreams!

products.name: Watery Kitty
products.description: Why not go under the sea with this kitty? Seashells, and fun adventures!

products.name: Bunny Kitty
products.description: Can't decide between a bunny or kitty? Neither can we! So why not both?

products.name: Scary Kitty
products.description: Yikes! Don't be afraid, this monster is completely friendly! She might even invite you out for some ice cream!

products.name: Ribbity Kitty
products.description: Anybody down to play some Leap Frog? This Kitty sure is!

products.name: Pretty Kitty
products.description: It's not everyday that you wake up just looking this cute!

products.name: Snowy Kitty
products.description: We love helping our friends, in snow or shine. That's why this Kitty always makes it to the nice list!
